title: Ranked Leavers
body:
I find it pretty disgusting that I still have to endure a loss (during my promotionals, as well) simply because my ADC went afk at five minutes. 

Surely this has happened to tons of people before, so why isn't there a way to make it not count as a loss for the team with the afk, but a win for the other team? It's pretty unfair.

replies.body:
Because you could just duo with a friend, and if the game wasn't going how you wanted it to, your mate could leave to spare you LP.

Changes like this would result in even more afks, unfortunately.
